word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重存在的时间相当长，超过正常的或所期望的时间。
多指过程，强调持续而无终止，常含不间断之意。
与last同义，但还指经受住，有能耐忍受而并不受损。
强调超过了指定的或正常的时间。
普通用词。或指持续而不停止，或有一段中断后又继续下去。
通俗用词，多用于口语中。go on+-ing表暂停后继续做原事，即后继续的内容与原来的内容相同。go on+不定式指做完某事后，接着做不同的另一件事。

bilingual.source: If we allow this kind of labeling to continue, we will all lose.
bilingual.target: 如果我们允许这种标签继续下去，我们都将失败。

bilingual.source: And he said, "Fruit pies are up next. And my baking will continue as well."
bilingual.target: 他说："接下来是水果派。我的烘焙也会继续下去。"
我们不能任其继续下去了。

bilingual.source: It would be senseless to continue any further.
bilingual.target: 再继续下去就没意义了.

bilingual.source: I am hopeful that the debate will continue.
bilingual.target: 我相信，辩论将继续下去。

bilingual.source: As such, Bogda says, the strike will continue.
bilingual.target: 博格达说，罢工将会继续下去。

bilingual.source: Would you like to initialize and continue?
bilingual.target: 你想要初始化并且继续下去吗？

bilingual.source: We can't permit this situation to continue.
bilingual.target: 我们绝不允许这种情况继续下去。

bilingual.source: Many think the long boom will continue.
bilingual.target: 许多人认为，长期的繁荣将继续下去。

bilingual.source: The combat between good and evil will continue forever.
bilingual.target: 善与恶的斗争将永远继续下去.

list.abstract: continue（[kənˈtɪnjuː]），英语单词，作动词用，为继续；坚持下去；恢复。短语搭配有continue to do（继续做），例句为“The electric generators continue to work.（发电机继续工作）”。 continue不及物动词类近义词有run on、carry on with，相关反义词有discontinue。continue名词形式为continuant。

C、Java，MATLAB语言中，continue语句一般形式为"continue;"
其作用为结束本次循环。即跳出循环体中下面尚未执行的语句，对于while循环，继续求解循环条件。而对于for循环程序流程接着求解for语句头中的第三个部分expression表达式。continue语句和break语句的区别是：
continue语句只结束本次循环，而不终止整个循环的执行。而break语句则是结束整个循环过程，不再判断执行循环的条件是否成立。

yingyinNormal.en: Taylor McHessey, 15 minutes. Shall the carnage continue? Holidays are over, people. Way over!
yingyinNormal.zh: 泰勒 麦克西，15分钟。大屠杀还要继续下去吗？各位，假期早已结束，同学们。

yingyinNormal.en: Shall we continue this in my office?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去我办公室继续吧？

yingyinNormal.en: You sure, sweetie? Please, continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你确定吗，亲爱的？拜托，请继续。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Adversity is to be expected. Continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 万事开头难，继续。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a death sentence. Your life can continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是末日，你的生活还将继续。

yingyinNormal.en: No, counselor. I think she's doing fine. Continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，律师，我觉得她做得挺好，继续。

yingyinNormal.en: To continue on your quest, leave no stone unturned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 继续你的征程，要翻转每一个石头(找遍每一个角落)。

yingyinNormal.en: You continue to underestimate my capabilities, madam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你又在低估我的智商了，小姐。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? The scientist guy? Really? Chandler? Continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？那个科学家？真的吗？钱德？继续说。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll continue to strengthen our defenses here at home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们将继续加强国内的防卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Continue the work we were doing before we were banished.
yingyinNormal.zh: 继续我们未完成的事业。

yingyinNormal.en: Go ahead, Dan, continue. You seriously don't remember me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴，继续。你们真的记不得我了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Father, may we continue with the lesson? I seek knowledge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸 我们可以继续上课吗？我渴望知识。

yingyinNormal.en: We are willing to continue discussions on a potential compromise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们愿意继续谈判基于一个有可能性的妥协的基础上

yingyinNormal.en: It is possible I will continue making hilarious mistakes. Probably.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很可能会继续犯逗比错误。可能哦。

yingyinNormal.en: I see. Continue, Dolores.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白了，接着读吧，德洛丽丝。

yingyinNormal.en: Good. My time has come. You must continue your journey without me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好 我的时辰到了，剩下的路我不能陪你走了。

yingyinNormal.en: Heather. Heather. Will you continue to do the work I've done, Heather?
yingyinNormal.zh: 希瑟。你能继续我未竟的事业吗，希瑟？

yingyinNormal.en: We did this together. And we'll continue to do this together. Together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们一起搭起了这座桥，我们也会继续一起坚守。我们一起。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no question who has to continue from here. It's us. You and me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 该谁来继续这毫无疑问。是我们。你和我。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Official retrospections <highlight>continue</highlight> as to why London 2012 failed to "inspire a generation."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官方继续反思为什么2012年伦敦奥运会未能“激励一代人”。

examination_example.sentence: The growth of the use of English as the world's primary language for international communication has obviously been <highlight>continuing</highlight> for several decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英语作为世界上国际交流的主要语言，其使用人数的增长显然已经持续了几十年。

examination_example.sentence: The TSA cannot <highlight>continue</highlight> diverting resources into underused PreCheck lanes while most of the traveling public suffers in unnecessary lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当大多数普通乘客都在承受不必要的排队之苦时，美国联邦运输安全管理局（TSA）不能再继续将资源转移到未充分利用的预检通道了。

sense_info_list.en: to start speaking again after stopping

examination_example.sentence: Driving her point home, she <highlight>continued</highlight>: "It's increasingly apparent that the absence of purpose could become one of the most dangerous goals for capitalism and freedom."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了明确表达她的观点，她继续说：“事实越来越明显，目的的缺失可能会成为资本主义和自由最危险的目标之一。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: persist in an activity or process

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps, if we <highlight>continue</highlight> to improve information-processing machines, we'll soon have helpful rational assistants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们不断完善机器处理信息的能力，用不了多久我们就可能会拥有“理性的”得力助手。

examination_example.sentence: Although these may not seem like large effects, the impact of early attention problems <highlight>continued</highlight> throughout the children's academic careers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些影响看似不大，但早期注意力问题的影响贯穿了孩子们的整个学习生涯。

examination_example.sentence: Human achievements in mathematics <highlight>continue</highlight> to reach new levels of complexity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类在数学方面的成就不断达到新的复杂程度。

examination_example.sentence: Until students are able to resists the pull of social networking, testing, and endlessly surfing the web, they may <highlight>continue</highlight> to struggle in their classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非学生们能够抵制社交网络、考试和无休止的上网，否则他们可能会在课堂上继续挣扎。

examination_example.sentence: With <highlight>continuing</highlight> advances in individual genome(基因组)sequencing and the advent of personalized medicine, more non-scientists will need to be comfortable analyzing complex scientific information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着个人基因组测序的不断进步和个性化医学的出现，更多的非科学家将会轻松分析复杂的科学信息。

examination_example.sentence: As countries <highlight>continue</highlight> setting goals of reducing emissions, greater steps need to be taken to have a noticeable effect on the surrounding environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着各国继续设定减排目标，需要采取更多的措施才能对周围环境产生显著影响。

word_usage.usage:
continue作动词，基本意思是“继续，又开始”，不宜用于进行体，也不宜用still修饰。
天气仍然又冷又潮。
误 The weather is still continuing cold and wet.
正 The weather continues cold and wet.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指过程, 强调持续而无终止, 常含不间断之意。
endure 与 last 同义, 但还指经受住, 有能耐忍受而并不受损。
着重存在的时间相当长, 超过正常的或所期望的时间。

examination_example.sentence: While 53% believe men will <highlight>continue</highlight> to hold more top executive positions in business in the future, 44% say it's only a matter of time before as many women are in top executive positions as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然53%的人认为未来男性将继续在企业中担任更多的高层管理职位，但44%的人表示，女性与男性高管数量齐平只是时间问题。

examination_example.sentence: Stretching 269.13 meters, the Olympic class ships were wonders of naval technology, and everyone thought that they would <highlight>continue</highlight> to be so for quite some time. However, all suffered terrible accidents on the open seas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些奥林匹克级邮船长269.13米，是船艇技术的奇迹。所有人都认为它们在未来相当长的一段时间里仍会如此。然而，所有邮船都在公海上遭遇了严重事故。

examination_example.sentence: The feeling is just pure. But, he worries, if tourism isn't managed and his fellow locals <highlight>continue</highlight> to move to the mainland, his generation might be the last who can call themselves native Venetians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种感觉是纯粹的。但是，他担心，如果旅游业得不到管理，当地人继续搬迁到大陆，他们这一代可能是最后一代可以自称为威尼斯人的人了。

examination_example.sentence: Send another plane to <highlight>continue</highlight> the flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 派另一架飞机继续飞行。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指过程，强调持续而无终止，常含不间断之意。
endure 与 last 同义，但还指经受住，有能耐忍受而并不受损。
着重存在的时间相当长，超过正常的或所期望的时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 继续；坚持下去；恢复；重新开始；持续；延续；坚持；留任；使继续；维持原状

sense_info_list.en: persist in an activity or process

examination_example.sentence: It is clear that Confucius' thought will <highlight>continue</highlight> to be a necessary part of Chinese culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显然，孔子的思想将继续成为中国文化不可或缺的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: If we <highlight>continue</highlight> to kill elephants for their ivory, we humans will lose them in the end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们继续为了大象的象牙而捕杀大象，我们人类最终会失去它们。

examination_example.sentence: Today, local and national leaders <highlight>continue</highlight> to use the day to spread the message about the importance of clean hands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，地方和国家领导人继续利用这一天来传播关于清洁双手的重要性这一信息。

examination_example.sentence: The electric generators <highlight>continue</highlight> to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 发电机继续工作。

examination_example.sentence: They told the reporter that they would <highlight>continue</highlight> at the end of next year if they had the chance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们告诉记者，如果有机会的话，他们明年年底还会继续。

examination_example.sentence: With the help of the flying house, they <highlight>continued</highlight> their journey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在飞屋的帮助下，他们继续旅行。

word_usage.usage:
continue作动词，基本意思是“继续，又开始”，不宜用于进行体，也不宜用still修饰。
天气仍然又冷又潮。
误 The weather is still continuing cold and wet.
正 The weather continues cold and wet.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，既可指持续不断地做某事，也可指中断后再继续。
指继续做之前所做的某事或重复做同一件事。
